screen_desc: The screenshot shows the home screen of a smartphone with various app icons. The icons include Google search bar, Photos, Notes, Play Store, Maps, Camera, Chrome, Clock, Calendar, Contacts, Drive, Files, Gmail, Google, and Messages. The screen is organized in a grid layout with a section labeled "All apps." The time is 2:10, and the battery status is at 66%.

click on VLC for Android app to open
